title: GetAllGlobs overload to restrict results for directory
body:
There should be a `GetAllGlobs(string parentDirectory)` overload to only return globs that may point inside a directory.

`GetAllGlobs("src")` should return the globs marked with `x`

```
x "**/*.cs
x src/**/*.cs
x sr?/**/*.cs
x a/src/**/*.cs
b/**/*.cs
```

This method signature is already taken, unfortunate, so maybe a new method name like `GetAllGlobsUnderDirectory`

nodes.body: Closing as it does not really seem like there is a need for this at this point.
